posts.post_content:

[url]http://T206TheMonster.com[/url]

Bump for great deals on R&S die-cuts.

Also, I generally sneer at sellers who claim this, but that N28 Clarkson should be in a 3 holder, but priced at a 2.

Bump...

Still have 6 die-cuts (3 have been sold), and the N28's
The Anson is once again available - 2nd time the same deal has fallen through (not a board member).

Anson and Glasscock sold.

Remaining: Bennett and Clarkson, + 5 R&S die-cuts.  Thanks!
